nodes.text: Knel'char III was one of the three stars that were orbited by Darkknell, along with Knel'char I and II.

When Sith Lord Daiman ruled Darkknell, he made the populace believe he was always watching them through the stars Knel'char II and Knel'char III, which he referred to as his "eyes". If a person snickered when the stars' orbits made him seem cross-eyed, Daiman would send out his Correctors to "correct" that person.
